MP0.description: Memory Pointer 0 register for indirect addressing.

MP1L.description: Memory Pointer 1 Low register for data table or look-up table read operations.

MP1H.description: Memory Pointer 1 High register for data table or look-up table read operations.

MP2L.description: Memory Pointer 2 Low register for EEPROM data access.

MP2H.description: Memory Pointer 2 High register for EEPROM data access.

IAR0.description: Indirect Addressing Register 0, returns result of indirect addressing using MP0.

IAR1.description: Indirect Addressing Register 1, returns result of indirect addressing using MP1.

IAR2.description: Indirect Addressing Register 2, returns result of indirect addressing using MP2.

GPIOA_DATA.description: Port A Data Register, controls the input/output state of Port A pins.

GPIOB_DATA.description: Port B Data Register, controls the input/output state of Port B pins.

GPIOC_DATA.description: Port C Data Register, controls the input/output state of Port C pins.

GPIOD_DATA.description: Port D Data Register, controls the input/output state of Port D pins.

GPIOA_PULLUP.description: Port A Pull-high Control Register, enables/disables internal pull-up resistors for Port A pins.

GPIOB_PULLUP.description: Port B Pull-high Control Register, enables/disables internal pull-up resistors for Port B pins.

GPIOC_PULLUP.description: Port C Pull-high Control Register, enables/disables internal pull-up resistors for Port C pins.

GPIOD_PULLUP.description: Port D Pull-high Control Register, enables/disables internal pull-up resistors for Port D pins.

TBLP.description: Table Pointer Low Register, used for indirectly addressing data table or look-up table read operations.

TBHP.description: Table Pointer High Register, used for indirectly addressing data table or look-up table read operations.

TBLH.description: Table High Register, stores the high byte of the look-up table data read from Flash Memory.

DPH.description: Data Pointer High Register, used for data memory access.

DPL.description: Data Pointer Low Register, used for data memory access.

ACC.description: Accumulator Register, involved in all data transfer and arithmetic/logic operations.

PCL.description: Program Counter Low Register, the lower byte of the 14-bit program counter.

STATUS.description: Status Register, contains zero (Z), carry (C), auxiliary carry (AC), overflow (OV), power down (PDF), and watchdog time-out (TO) flags, and CPU operation status control bits.

INT_CR0.description: Interrupt Control Register 0, enables/disables various interrupt sources.

INT_CR1.description: Interrupt Control Register 1, enables/disables various interrupt sources.

INT_CR2.description: Interrupt Control Register 2, enables/disables various interrupt sources.

INT_CR3.description: Interrupt Control Register 3, enables/disables various interrupt sources.

INT_MFI0.description: Multi-function Interrupt Register 0, contains flags for various peripheral interrupts.

INT_MFI1.description: Multi-function Interrupt Register 1, contains flags for various peripheral interrupts.

INT_MFI2.description: Multi-function Interrupt Register 2, contains flags for various peripheral interrupts.

INT_MFI3.description: Multi-function Interrupt Register 3, contains flags for various peripheral interrupts.

ADC_CR0.description: A/D Converter Control Register 0, configures ADC operation modes and trigger sources.

ADC_CR1.description: A/D Converter Control Register 1, configures ADC channel selection and reference voltage.

ADC_CHER.description: A/D Converter Channel Enable Register, enables/disables specific analog input channels.

ADC_DR_L.description: A/D Converter Data Register Low, stores the lower byte of the A/D conversion result.

ADC_DR_H.description: A/D Converter Data Register High, stores the higher byte of the A/D conversion result.

CTM_CNT_H.description: Compact Type Timer Module (CTM) Counter High Register.

CTM_CNT_L.description: Compact Type Timer Module (CTM) Counter Low Register.

CTM_COMPA.description: Compact Type Timer Module (CTM) Comparator Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

CTM_CR0.description: Compact Type Timer Module (CTM) Control Register 0, configures CTM operating mode and clock source.

CTM_CR1.description: Compact Type Timer Module (CTM) Control Register 1, configures CTM output polarity and interrupt enable.

STM_CNT_H.description: Standard Type Timer Module (STM) Counter High Register.

STM_CNT_L.description: Standard Type Timer Module (STM) Counter Low Register.

STM_COMPA.description: Standard Type Timer Module (STM) Comparator Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

STM_CR0.description: Standard Type Timer Module (STM) Control Register 0, configures STM operating mode and clock source.

STM_CR1.description: Standard Type Timer Module (STM) Control Register 1, configures STM output polarity and interrupt enable.

PTM0_CNT_H.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Counter High Register.

PTM0_CNT_L.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Counter Low Register.

PTM0_COMPA_H.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Comparator High Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

PTM0_COMPA_L.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Comparator Low Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

PTM0_CR0.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Control Register 0, configures PTM0 operating mode and clock source.

PTM0_CR1.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 0 (PTM0) Control Register 1, configures PTM0 output polarity and interrupt enable.

PTM1_CNT_H.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Counter High Register.

PTM1_CNT_L.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Counter Low Register.

PTM1_COMPA_H.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Comparator High Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

PTM1_COMPA_L.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Comparator Low Register A, used for compare match or PWM output.

PTM1_CR0.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Control Register 0, configures PTM1 operating mode and clock source.

PTM1_CR1.description: Periodic Type Timer Module 1 (PTM1) Control Register 1, configures PTM1 output polarity and interrupt enable.

TM_PIN_CR.description: Timer Module Input/Output Pin Control Register, configures alternate functions for timer module pins.

SPI_SR.description: SPI Status Register, indicates SPI communication status and flags.

SPI_CR0.description: SPI Control Register 0, configures SPI operating mode (master/slave), clock polarity/phase.

SPI_CR1.description: SPI Control Register 1, configures SPI data order and enable/disable.

SPI_DR.description: SPI Data Buffer Register, used for transmitting and receiving SPI data.

I2C_SR.description: I2C Status Register, indicates I2C bus status and communication flags.

I2C_CR.description: I2C Control Register, configures I2C operating mode and enables/disables features.

I2C_DR.description: I2C Communication Data Register, used for transmitting and receiving I2C data.

I2C_TMR.description: I2C Time-out Control Register, configures time-out detection for I2C bus operations.

UART_SR.description: UART Status Register, indicates UART transmit/receive status and error flags.

UART_CR0.description: UART Control Register 0, configures UART operating parameters like mode and data bits.

UART_CR1.description: UART Control Register 1, configures UART parity, stop bits, and interrupt enables.

UART_TX_DR.description: UART Transmit Data Register, holds data to be transmitted via UART.

UART_RX_DR.description: UART Receive Data Register, holds received data from UART.

UART_BRG_H.description: Baud Rate Generator High Register, controls the high byte of the UART baud rate.

UART_BRG_L.description: Baud Rate Generator Low Register, controls the low byte of the UART baud rate.

LCD_CR0.description: LCD Control Register 0, configures general LCD driver operation.

LCD_CR1.description: LCD Control Register 1, configures specific LCD driver features.

LCD_CST.description: LCD Constant Bias Current Control Register.

LCD_DB0.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 0, stores segment data for LCD display.

LCD_DB1.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 1, stores segment data for LCD display.

LCD_DB2.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 2, stores segment data for LCD display.

LCD_DB3.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 3, stores segment data for LCD display.

LCD_DB4.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 4, stores segment data for LCD display.

LCD_DB5.description: LCD Data Buffer Register 5, stores segment data for LCD display.

EEPROM_ADDR_L.description: EEPROM Address Register Low, specifies the lower byte of the EEPROM memory address for read/write operations.

EEPROM_ADDR_H.description: EEPROM Address Register High, specifies the higher byte of the EEPROM memory address for read/write operations.

EEPROM_DATA_L.description: EEPROM Data Register Low, holds the lower byte of data to be written to or read from EEPROM.

EEPROM_DATA_H.description: EEPROM Data Register High, holds the higher byte of data to be written to or read from EEPROM.

EEPROM_CR0.description: EEPROM Control Register 0, controls EEPROM read/write operations and write protection.

EEPROM_CR1.description: EEPROM Control Register 1, controls EEPROM interrupt enable.

RCC_CLKSEL.description: System Clock Selection Register, selects the main system clock source (HXT, LXT, HIRC, LIRC).

RCC_CLKDIV.description: System Clock Division Register, sets the division ratio for the system clock.

RCC_PWRCON.description: Power Control Register, controls the system operation modes (Normal, Slow, IDLE, SLEEP).

LVD_CR.description: Low Voltage Detector Control Register, configures the LVD threshold and enable/disable.

RCC_RSTF.description: Reset Flag Register, indicates the source of the last MCU reset.

WDT_CR.description: Watchdog Timer Control Register, configures the WDT enable, prescaler, and time-out period.

GPIOA_TRANSISTOR.description: Port A Transistor Control Register, configures Port A output type (CMOS or N-channel open drain).

GPIOB_TRANSISTOR.description: Port B Transistor Control Register, configures Port B output type (CMOS or N-channel open drain).

GPIOC_TRANSISTOR.description: Port C Transistor Control Register, configures Port C output type (CMOS or N-channel open drain).

GPIOD_TRANSISTOR.description: Port D Transistor Control Register, configures Port D output type (CMOS or N-channel open drain).

GPIOA_SOURCE_CURRENT.description: Port A Source Current Control Register, sets the drive strength for Port A output pins.

GPIOB_SOURCE_CURRENT.description: Port B Source Current Control Register, sets the drive strength for Port B output pins.

GPIOC_SOURCE_CURRENT.description: Port C Source Current Control Register, sets the drive strength for Port C output pins.

GPIOD_SOURCE_CURRENT.description: Port D Source Current Control Register, sets the drive strength for Port D output pins.
